list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: at or to the far side of (something), typically so as to be hidden by it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the recording machinery was kept behind screens
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Máy ghi âm được giữ đằng sau màn hình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: in a line or procession, following or further back than (another member of the line or procession).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bị mắc kẹt đằng sau một máy kéo di chuyển chậm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: in support of or giving guidance to (someone else).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: whatever you decide to do, I'll be behind you
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bất cứ điều gì bạn quyết định làm, tôi sẽ đứng sau bạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: after the departure or death of (the person referred to).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he left behind him a manuscript that was subsequently published
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta để lại một bản thảo sau đó được xuất bản.

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: less advanced than (someone else) in achievement or development.
having a lower score than (another competitor).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Woodnam moved to ten under par, five shots behind Fred Couples
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Woodnam chuyển đến mười dưới mệnh, năm bức ảnh đằng sau các cặp vợ chồng Fred

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: at or to the far side or the back side of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Campbell nắm lấy anh ta từ phía sau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: remaining after someone or something is gone.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đừng để tôi lại phía sau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: further back than other members of a group.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Bill led the way, with the others a short distance behind
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bill đã dẫn đường, với những người khác một quãng ngắn phía sau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in a game or contest) having a score lower than that of the opposition.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: polls showed him as much as 50 points behind
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các cuộc thăm dò cho thấy anh ta đến 50 điểm phía sau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: slow or late in accomplishing a task.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: đứng sau với công việc của tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: in a place or time already past.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cuộc phiêu lưu nằm phía sau họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a one-point score made by kicking the ball between the outer set of two sets of goalposts (the behind line), or by touching the ball, causing it to pass between the inner posts (goalposts).
